Lyric:
[by:莎士比亚书店]
[00:14.29]I've been  staring at the edge of the water
[00:18.45]Long as I can remember, never really knowing why
[00:26.31]I wish I could be the perfect daughter
[00:30.53]But I come back to the water, no matter how hard I try
[00:37.78]Every turn I take, every trail I track
[00:40.71]Every path I make, every road leads back
[00:43.81]To the place I know, where I can not go, though I long to be
[00:49.54]See the line where the sky meets the sea? It calls me
[00:54.62]And no one knows, how far it goes
[01:01.00]If the wind in my sail on the sea stays behind me
[01:05.92]One day I'll know, if I go there's just no telling how far I'll go
[01:13.23]I know everybody on this island, seems so happy on this island
[01:19.85]Everything is by design
[01:24.23]I know everybody on this island has a role on this island
[01:31.13]So maybe I can roll with mine
[01:35.29]I can lead with pride, I can make us strong
[01:38.04]I'll be satisfied if I play along
[01:40.94]But the voice inside sings a different song
[01:43.85]What is wrong with me?
[01:49.56]See the light as it shines on the sea? It's blinding
[01:54.70]But no one knows, how deep it goes
[02:00.97]And it seems like it's calling out to me, so come find me
[02:05.97]And let me know, what's beyond that line, will I cross that line?
[02:12.56]See the line where the sky meets the sea? It calls me
[02:17.59]And no one knows, how far it goes
[02:23.74]If the wind in my sail on the sea stays behind me
[02:28.85]One day I'll know, how far I'll go
